item.title: AppsCultura workshop: using Europeana content and the Europeana API
item.description: ["Apps&Cultura has teamed up with Europeana Creative for this year’s Hack at Home competition and the second round of the Europeana Creative Challenges. In this workshop the team from Europeana will be organising a hands on workshop demonstrating how to use the Europeana API and include it into your applications."]

item.title: Open Knowledge Festival 2014 - Open Minds to Open Action
item.description: ["The event gathers together open movement makers, thinkers, activists and researchers from around the world. To inspire 'Open Minds to Open Action' (as the slogan goes), the 2014 edition will be a space for learning and dialogue where the activities of the international participants shapes the event and its outcomes."]

item.title: The Europas - The European Tech Startup Awards
item.description: ["Founded in 2009, The Europas are the premier awards for Europe’s most forward thinking, progressive and innovative tech companies across over some 20+ categories."]

item.title: First Europeana Creative Challenge Award Ceremony
item.description: ["The event formally closes the first challenge on history education and natural history education themes."]

item.title: Coding Da Vinci
item.description: ["Coding Da Vinci is organised by the German Digital Library, Digital Service Center Berlin, Open Knowledge Foundation Germany and Wikimedia Germany. It brings together developers, web and game designers and representatives of cultural institutions to explore ideas for re-use of cultural content."]

item.title: Coding Da Vinci competition award ceremony
item.description: ["The ceremony is preceded by a get together BBQ for all participants. On Day 2 the hackathon finalists will present their project and win cool prizes."]

item.title: 2nd Europeana Creative Challenge on Tourism and Social Networks (online)
item.description: ["App developers, e-book publishers, web and game designers will be invited to submit their ideas for the re-use of cultural content in tourism and social network applications."]

item.title: International Business Lounge, Future Everything Conference
item.description: ["The International Business Lounge is the culmination of the first year of Apps for Europe. From the various Business Lounge events that have taken place and an open call for participants, ten winners have been chosen to present their work at FutureEverything."]
